scripts.deploy:delete-staging-tag: git fetch --tags && git push origin --delete $(git tag -l 'staging-learn-gcp-*') || true && git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*'
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn deploy:delete-staging-tag && TAG=`echo staging-learn-gcp-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)` && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
